Pretty great game but while playing it, i feel kinda lonely because youre alone in the facility

"SPAAAAAAAAACE!" It is 10 times funnier than the original and has new elements to the puzzles that make them even more mentally stimulating. The co-op playthrough is fun if you have a friend, but can be a little frustrating with a stranger because of the lack of communication. The most fun is in the community testing chambers where you can build your own puzzles or test the puzzles of others so you never get bored or run out of challenges.
As long as the laws of physics apply, this will be one of the best games you'll ever play. If the laws of physics should no longer apply, God help you.
masterpiece
SO FUN :D

This was a really good stepup from the original Portal game in my opinion. Really good story, the puzzles are more challenging, and they have added in a larger sense of comedy with some more drama and a nice twist. Really loved it.
(still not a potato person). 9/10

Portal é um jogo tão envolvente, criativo e bonito de ser jogado, que quando se chega no final do game você fica mal. Mal por não ter jogado mais e desfrutado de todo o enredo que os personagens te proporcionam ao jogar.
Não existe superior, maior ou melhor. Portal é e sempre será, o melhor game de puzzles já criado em todos os tempos. Obrigado Valve!
I think it is a realy good and fun puzzle game, definitely buy it if you like puzzles.

La prova che i sequel possono battere il primo capitolo ! Portal 2 superà in tutto Portal ... La campagna è fantastica e una volta finita si possono comunque scaricare delle mod che rendono questo gioco infinito !  it's been a long time...

Considerato da tanti: innovativo. Non posso che dar ragione.
Un titolo in cui magari la trama non è il motore principale, ma che sicuramente spinge ad usare la materia grigia.
Forza ad utilizzare un nuovo modo di pensare. Fuori dagli schemi che conosciamo.
All'inizio può risultare macchinoso, ma andando avanti si entra più di quel che si vuole nell'orbita di Portal 2.
Consigliato sia in Single Player che in Coop, per la varietà di livelli, nonchè di Storia.
Apertura mentale: 10/10

Well, I know I was late because I bought this game in 2014 (SHOULD HAVE BUY IT WHEN IT RELEASED!), at first I don't even think to buy this game, but after a while, when I see the rate is 95/100 (and also because it's discount) I decided to buy it quickly. So here is my review for this game :

1. FPS Game that doesn't have any blood in it (instead therer are blue and orange gel, oh of course water too)
2. FPS Game that make the players have to think so much to just complete 1 LEVEL!
3. FPS Game that has unlimited ammo! (Which everyone wanted to have in any FPS Game)
4. FPS Game where you are the only human living in it.
5. FPS Game that make a really great story and sometimes the story is depend on the player's choice
6. FPS Game where you don't even know what time is it in there
7. And lastly, FPS Game that have robots who can speak clearly and feel like human...

So, as I mentioned before, this game makes you think so damn much (maybe you will think harder than when you study), but as the result, you will become smarter and of course your IQ will be improved, but remember, after playing this game then you will be left behind because you are too focus on the game XD

*PS : THIS GAME SHOULD BE RATE 100 out of 100!!!

Just, just yes. Yes. Without a doubt my favorite puzzle game. Enjoyable and occasionally challenging puzzles, in-depth storyline, excelent characters and development on them and the story, plot twists, easter eggs, radios with everlasting batteries, the most polite guns you'll ever come across, the most abnoxious yet comical guns you'll come across, smooth jazz, asbestos spheres, asbestos cubes, asbestos walls, asbestos floors, asbestos ceilings, asbestos force fields, gravity-defying asbestos funnels, asbestos, radioactive goo: available in blue, orange, white, and clear variants, idiotic robots, homicidal robots, robots with addictions, know-it-all robots, robots with terrible pick up lines, guns that can tell the future, guns that can tear holes in the fabric of space and time, giant TV sreens, small TV screens, nasty old beds, nasty old furniture, nasty old bedrooms, nasty old dead people, fake docking stations, real dry docks, robot frankensteins, immortal crows, mantis men, time travel, sentient cubes, big red lasers, big red buttons, even bigger red buttons, jumpsuits, works of art, and of course, talking potatoes.

Basically, you name it, Portal's got it. A must have for any human being. Or AI too, I guess....
A game that i enjoy playing a lot, funny singleplayer and even better multiplayer which gets exciting with friends, one of its  kind !
A game with both a great atmosphere and storyline. The puzzle styled gameplay is unlike anything else out there and I highly recommend it. 10/10
This game is absolutely amazing

Better then Portal 1, longer, more graphical, better story, and voice acting. Worth a buy, but you probably wont play the story more then once, because the game wont be as fun the second time around since you already know the puzzles.  This is definitely worth its first gamethrough though, its an amazing part of gaming history, don't be left out, play Portal 1 and 2,

Hey it's 2020 and I decided to edit my review and play through the game again.

Even today, it's a work of art. Great gameplay, intriguing lore and a unique atmosphere created by aesthetics and music make this one of, if not the best game made by Valve, probably ever.

Buy it. It's not just a game, it's an experience
